description:
The playground is where we explore new worlds and friends. Explore the land and help other kids fulfill their dreams.  

https://lionfish-studios.com/hgjtest/  WEB BUILD

(Also, made in Unity)

Design Philosophy:

The games tries to capture the innocence of youth and the idea of people leaving our lives as we grow up. The core premise of the game is the playground that represents a safe space where our imaginations can make us see the world differently. The friends  you encounter there represents people whose lives intertwine with yours during one part of your life, but they will eventually move on. However, by helping them during their toughest times, you might forge a bond with will last you a lifetime. If not, you might have a small regret that you have to learn to live with. One other key aspect of the game is to separate the notion of friendship versus companionship, where the latter requires much more dedication and commitment to sustain.

That's all we have for this game jam! Hope the game does tell you a story that you'll enjoy, see you awesome folks in the next one! 

Have fun, keep gaming!
